ai-tha-ap383:0.3_0: The Elder Nunsaka received the fruit of that gift
ai-tha-ap383:1.2_0: if they sleep like a sage should beamed;
ai-tha-ap383:1.4_0: I went out of my resort.
ai-tha-ap383:2.1_0: I’ve seen fruits in the fruit,
ai-tha-ap383:2.4_0: took a fruit of what is not good,
ai-tha-ap383:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap383:3.2_0: that I’ve drunk the iron ball,
ai-tha-ap383:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap383:4.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap383:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap383:5.2_0: to be in the presence of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap383:6.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap383:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable P fruits.
